scripts.gen:supabase: doppler run --command 'pnpm supabase gen types typescript --db-url $DATABASE_URL > supabase.types.ts'
scripts.push: doppler run -c dev --command 'prisma db push && prisma generate && pnpm gen:supabase'
scripts.push:prod: doppler run -c production -- prisma db push && prisma generate
scripts.pull: doppler run -c dev -- prisma db pull && prisma generate
scripts.pull:prod: doppler run -c production -- prisma db pull && prisma generate
